name: Stock Unlock
headline: Web-app | investment education and analysis tools for retail investors
description:
Stock Unlock is an investment education and analysis platform, built by retail investors, for retail investors. We make it easy for noobies to start their investment journey, and save time for the pros.

We are building THE place for investors to learn, grow, and invest confidently.

founders.name: Jake Ruth, Founder
founders.description:
Jake is a software engineer that has always had a love for solving problems (like rubik's cubes) and building things (coding!).

Today Jake has a decade of experience working as a senior software engineer at companies like Oscar Health. Jake is a "culture warrior" and always looking to solve tough problems.

founders.name: Daniel Pronk, Founder
founders.description: Daniel Pronk is the co-founder and CFO of Stock Unlock. He is an adaptable entrepreneur who thrives on fresh challenges and personal growth. He became an entrepreneur in his youth and has started multiple businesses. Currently he owns an investing and finance YouTube channel with over 192,000 subscribers. He believes anything is achievable for those who are willing to work hard, and most importantly, believe in themselves.

## Have a question before signing up?
Here are the most frequent of them. Feel free to reach out to us if your query isn’t here. One of our lovely representatives will get back to you in less than a day.
Is Stock Unlock free?
Stock Unlock provides access to over 100k+ stocks and ETFs for free, without an account. Creating an account allows for additional features like watchlists and portfolios. Some data and features are exclusive to paid accounts.
What is your cancellation policy?
At Stock Unlock, we strive to put the customer first. That's why we offer a full refund within 30 days of purchase. After 30 days, we provide prorated refunds to account for the time you had access. As a consumer friendly company, we aim to make the cancellation process easy and accommodating. Simply email support@stockunlock.com, and we'll take care of the rest.
How does billing work?
Stock Unlock partners with the globally renowned payment processor, Stripe, to handle all transactions. We offer flexible billing options, allowing you to choose between monthly or yearly subscriptions. Payments can be made in USD, CAD, or Euro, depending on your preference.
How do I change my account email?
Email support@stockunlock.com if you’re looking to change your email address. We will be happy to help.
Where does Stock Unlock get its data from?
Stock Unlock sources its data from Finnhub, a provider of high-quality financial data. Our data encompasses over 65 global exchanges, ensuring a broad market coverage. We also standardize all our financials according to GAAP for consistency and reliability.

## Have a question before signing up?
Here are the most frequent of them. Feel free to reach out to us if your query isn’t here. One of our lovely representatives will get back to you in less than a day.
Is Stock Unlock free?
Stock Unlock provides access to over 100k+ stocks and ETFs for free, without an account. Creating an account allows for additional features like watchlists and portfolios. Some data and features are exclusive to paid accounts.
What is your cancellation policy?
At Stock Unlock, we strive to put the customer first. That's why we offer a full refund within 30 days of purchase. After 30 days, we provide prorated refunds to account for the time you had access. As a consumer friendly company, we aim to make the cancellation process easy and accommodating. Simply email support@stockunlock.com, and we'll take care of the rest.
How does billing work?
Stock Unlock partners with the globally renowned payment processor, Stripe, to handle all transactions. We offer flexible billing options, allowing you to choose between monthly or yearly subscriptions. Payments can be made in USD, CAD, or Euro, depending on your preference.
How do I change my account email?
Email support@stockunlock.com if you’re looking to change your email address. We will be happy to help.
Where does Stock Unlock get its data from?
Stock Unlock sources its data from Finnhub, a provider of high-quality financial data. Our data encompasses over 65 global exchanges, ensuring a broad market coverage. We also standardize all our financials according to GAAP for consistency and reliability.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Stock Unlock**

Founded in 2021 and a graduate of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Stock Unlock is a dynamic investment education and analysis platform based in New York. Built by retail investors for retail investors, their mission is simple yet ambitious: to create a comprehensive web application where investors—regardless of their experience—can learn, grow, and invest confidently.

**Core Mission**

Stock Unlock is not just about data; it's about empowerment. It aims to demystify the investment landscape for newcomers while also providing sophisticated tools for seasoned investors. Whether you’re just starting out or you’re looking to refine your strategies, Stock Unlock is designed to save time and streamline your decision-making process.

**Key Features**

The platform boasts an extensive array of features designed to enhance investing capabilities:

1. **AI Reporting**: One-click AI-generated stock analysis.
2. **Global Coverage**: Access to over 130,000 global stocks and ETFs across 65 exchanges.
3. **Portfolio Tracking**: Connect brokerage accounts for seamless portfolio management.
4. **Event Notifications**: Real-time alerts about your holdings.
5. **Custom Watchlists**: Stay organized with personalized tracking of stocks.
6. **Insights Score**: Helps identify better investment opportunities.
7. **Stock Screener**: Find stocks using customizable criteria.
8. **DCF Calculator**: Estimate future stock values based on projections.
9. **Dividend Analysis**: Deep insights into dividends and their potential impact.
10. **Learn Mode**: Transform pages into lessons for ongoing education.

**Community and Support**

Stock Unlock has garnered a devoted user base that appreciates its user-friendly design and robust community support. Testimonials highlight the platform's effectiveness in simplifying investment analysis and enhancing understanding among both novices and experts alike.

**Team and Leadership**

With a compact team of six, Stock Unlock works under the guidance of Group Partner Diana Hu, who helps steer the company’s direction and initiatives towards its lofty goals.

**Current Offers and Accessibility**

The company frequently announces promotions, such as its **25% off Black Friday Sale** on all plans, making it an attractive option for those looking to explore its tools without getting overwhelmed by initial costs. Users can start their journey for **free** with a no-obligation plan.

You can explore more about Stock Unlock and its offerings at [stockunlock.com](https://stockunlock.com).

In a nutshell, Stock Unlock recognizes that investing doesn’t have to be daunting. They aim to bridge the gap between knowledge and action, ensuring that users feel empowered to make informed decisions. It’s all about turning data into actionable insights for a brighter financial future.
